commit_list.message:
Change the Column span prop so it behaves more like Bootstrap

This fixes a problem where the spans were defaulted to 0 when only one
or two of the spans were provided as props which caused the hidden-*
class to be applied causing surprising behavior.

commit_list.message:
Pave the way for adding the "pill" type tabs

* deprecate `useTabsInMobile` prop in favor of explicitly specifying `type=menu`
* add a `type` prop, defaulting to 'standard'
* extract MenuTabs and StandardTabs from Tabs
* Tabs now chooses which style to render based on the `type` prop

commit_list.message:
Kill the select-like tab menu for small screens

This makes Tabs simpler and more focused. This pushes the decision of
whether to show a Select or Tabs onto the container component.

commit_list.message:
Add ThemeProvider and ThemeContext components

These components will remove the need for the theme prop to be passed to
every instance of the theme-able components. ThemeProvider can be
configured at the top-level of an app and will make the theme available
to all children.
